DataElement.preferredName: EPIC-CP Questionnaire 14 Past 4 Weeks Problem Lack of Sexual Function Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation, in the past 4 weeks, of how much of a problem their sexual function has been for them overall, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice Questionnaire Past 4 Weeks EPIC-CP - Problem Lack of Sexual Function Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Chang et al in 2011, which is used to measure urinary incontinence, urinary irritation, and the bowel, sexual and hormonal health related quality of life in patients with prostate cancer. This instrument contains 16 items._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite for Clinical Practice (EPIC-CP) Overall, how much of a problem has your sexual function or lack of sexual function been for you?_A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
